title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 4 2022
description:
Where's Fauci? Obscure podcasts and local D.C. television. Pro-mask demonstrators sing in New York. Dangerous: Blinken says NATO is "ready for war" with Putin. DeSantis addresses bullying allegations. Florida surgeon general: No benefit to masks for young people. What will happen to Buck at the rodeo? Clay and Buck rate their favorite fair foods. Stacey Abrams compares herself to Zelensky. C&B finish the show at Houston affiliate KTRH looking forward to tonight's barbecue, beer, bourbon and live music event with their radio friends Michael Berry and Jesse Kelly and meeting hopefully 1,000 or more listeners. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
